Name Rascal/Libraries/IO/readFileLines

Synopsis Read the contens of a file and return it as a list of strings.
Function list[str] readFileLines(loc filename) throws UnsupportedScheme(loc file), PathNotFound(loc file), IOError(str msg)
Description Return the contents of a file location as a list of lines. Also see readFile.
